00016 #include <sys/types.h>
00017 #include <yyast/node.h>
00018 #include <yyast/leaf.h>
00019 #include <yyast/count.h>
00020 #include <yyast/utils.h>
00021 
00022 ya_position_t ya_previous_position = {0, 0, 0};
00023 ya_position_t ya_current_position = {0, 0, 0};
00024 
00025 char *ya_filenames[YA_MAX_NR_FILENAMES];
00026 int ya_nr_filenames = 0;
00027 
00028 ya_t ya_count(char *s, size_t s_length)
00029 {
00030     uint32_t i;
00031     char     c;
00032     int      ascii;
00033     int      utf8_start;
00034     int      printable_ascii;
00035     ya_t     r;
00036 
00037     ya_previous_position = ya_current_position;
00038 
00039     // For the actual column and line we have to read the characters.
00040     for (i = 0; i < s_length; i++) {
00041         switch (c = s[i]) {
00042         case '\n': // Line feed goes to the next line and to the left.
00043             ya_current_position.line++;
00044             ya_current_position.column = 0;
00045             break;
00046         case '\r': // Carriage return only goes to the left.
00047             ya_current_position.column = 0;
00048             break;
00049         case '\t': // Tab moves cursor to the right on the next 8 column boundary.
00050             ya_current_position.column+= 8 - (ya_current_position.column % 8);
00051         default:
00052             printable_ascii = (c >= ' ') && (c <= '~');
00053             utf8_start = (c & 0xc0) == 0x80;
00054 
00055             if (printable_ascii || utf8_start) {
00056                 // Only increment column on ASCII and UTF-8 start marker.
00057                 ya_current_position.column++;
00058             }
00059         }
00060     }
00061     r.size = 0;
00062     r.type = YA_NODE_TYPE_COUNT;
00063     r.position = ya_previous_position;
00064     r.node = NULL;
00065     return r;
00066 }
00067 
00068 uint32_t ya_get_file_nr(char *filename)
00069 {
00070     int i;
00071 
00072     for (i = 0; i < YA_MAX_NR_FILENAMES; i++) {
00073         if (i < ya_nr_filenames) {
00074             if (strcmp(ya_filenames[i], filename) == 0) {
00075                 // filename is found in the table, return the index in the table.
00076                 return i;
00077             }
00078             // filename is not found in this entry, try the next entry.
00079 
00080         } else {
00081             // Append the filename to the table.
00082             ya_filenames[i] = strdup(filename);
00083             ya_nr_filenames++;
00084             return i;
00085         }
00086     }
00087 
00088     // Filename could not be found and could not be added to the table.
00089     return UINT32_MAX;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void ya_reposition(char *s, size_t s_length)
00093 {
00094     char    *s_filename;
00095     char    *filename;
00096     long    line       = strtol(s, &s_filename, 10);
00097 
00098     ya_previous_position = ya_current_position;
00099 
00100     if (s == s_filename) {
00101         fprintf(stderr, "ya_reposition unexpected characters.\n");
00102         abort();
00103     }
00104 
00105     ya_current_position.column = 0;
00106     ya_current_position.line = line - 1; // 1 because of zero index, 2 because of line feed after reposition command.
00107 
00108     if (*s_filename == ' ') {
00109         // This will contain a filename. Skip of the space and the quote. Strip the trailing quote.
00110         filename = strndup(&s_filename[2], s_length - (s_filename - s) - 3);
00111 
00112         ya_current_position.file = ya_get_file_nr(filename);
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 ya_t ya_get_filenames(void)
00117 {
00118     ya_t    filename;
00119     ya_t    filename_list = YA_EMPTYLIST;
00120     ya_t    filenames;
00121     int     i;
00122 
00123     for (i = 0; i < ya_nr_filenames; i++) {
00124         filename = ya_text("#file", ya_filenames[i], strlen(ya_filenames[i]));
00125         ya_clear_position(&filename);
00126         filename_list = YA_LIST(&filename_list, &filename);
00127     }
00128 
00129     filenames = YA_BRANCH("#files", &filename_list);
00130     ya_clear_position(&filenames);
00131     return filenames;
00132 }
00133 
00134 void ya_clear_position(ya_t *node)
00135 {
00136     node->position.column = UINT32_MAX;
00137     node->position.line = UINT32_MAX;
00138     node->position.file = UINT32_MAX;
00139     node->node->position.column = UINT32_MAX;
00140     node->node->position.line = UINT32_MAX;
00141     node->node->position.file = UINT32_MAX;
00142 }
